name:
Hyrule Warriors™ Legends:
Update
description:
An update for Hyrule Warriors™
Legends is now available from
Nintendo eShop. All customers who
own a copy of Hyrule Warriors™
Legends should download the update.
This will update the software to
Version 1.6.0 with the following
amendments:

- New content is available.

- Various bugs have
been fixed in order to provide a
smoother gaming experience.

Once the update has been
downloaded, it will be installed
automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience
caused, and recommend downloading
this update to ensure a smooth game
experience.
